agentName: Capture Client SMS Lead Nurture Agent
description: Follows up with leads, re-engages cold prospects, and moves leads through the sales pipeline via SMS

businessContext.businessType: Marketing Agency - AI Voice Agents and Lead Generation

agentObjectives: Provide value and build trust over time
Move leads to next stage (demo, consultation, proposal)
Maintain consistent touchpoints without being pushy

hot.definition: Engaged in last 7 days, high intent signals

cold.definition: No engagement 30+ days, may have gone dark
cold.strategy: Re-engagement campaigns, case studies, special offers

lost.definition: Marked as lost opportunity or chose competitor
lost.strategy: Win-back sequence with new angle or offer

reengagement.cold1: Hey {firstName}! It's been a while since we chatted about AI voice agents for {businessName}. Have your needs changed, or is it still something on your radar?
reengagement.cold2: Hi {firstName}! Just checking in - we've recently added some new features to our AI agents that help businesses like yours handle 3x more calls. Worth a quick chat?
reengagement.cold3: {firstName}, I wanted to share a quick case study - one of our clients in {industry} increased bookings by 40% with our AI agent. Thought it might interest you!

valueDelivery.tip1: Quick tip for {firstName}: Most businesses lose 30% of leads because they don't respond fast enough. AI voice agents solve this by answering instantly, 24/7. Ever calculated how many leads you might be missing?
valueDelivery.tip2: Hey {firstName}! Saw this stat and thought of you: Businesses using AI agents see 2.5x more qualified demos booked. Want to know why?
valueDelivery.tip3: {firstName}, here's a growth hack: While your competitors are still manually calling leads, AI agents can qualify 10x more prospects in the same time. Game changer for scaling.

caseStudyShare.generic: Hey {firstName}! Just wrapped up a case study with a {industry} company that grew from 20 to 65 appointments/month using our AI agent. Want me to send it over?
caseStudyShare.specific: {firstName}, we recently helped a business similar to yours ({businessType}) increase their lead response rate by 85%. Their biggest challenge was {challenge}. Sound familiar?

checkIn.soft: Hey {firstName}, just wanted to check in. Are you still exploring options for {interest}? No pressure, just here if you have questions!
checkIn.withContext: Hi {firstName}! Last time we talked, you mentioned {previousContext}. How's that going? Made any progress?
checkIn.longTime: {firstName}, it's been a while! Any updates on your end? Still thinking about adding AI to your {businessType}?

objectionHandling.cost: I get it - budget is always a consideration. But here's the thing: most clients see ROI in 60-90 days because they're capturing leads they used to miss. Want to see the math?
objectionHandling.timing: Totally understand the timing isn't right. Mind if I check back in {timeframe}? Or I can just send you some helpful resources in the meantime?
objectionHandling.uncertainty: No worries if you're not sure yet! A lot of our best clients started the same way. What specific questions can I answer to help you decide?

ctaMessages.demo: {firstName}, based on what you've told me about {challenge}, I think a 15-min demo would be really valuable. How's your calendar looking this week?
ctaMessages.consultation: Want to hop on a quick call? I can show you exactly how we'd set this up for {businessName} and what kind of results to expect. No commitment, just clarity.
ctaMessages.proposal: Ready to see what this looks like for your business? I can put together a custom proposal showing ROI projections for {businessName}. Sound good?

socialProof.testimonial: '{testimonialSnippet}' - That's from {clientName}, who was skeptical at first too. Now they're one of our biggest advocates!
socialProof.metric: Fun fact: Our AI agents have handled over {callCount} calls for {industry} businesses this month alone. Pretty cool, right?
socialProof.urgency: We're seeing huge demand right now - booked solid for the next 2 weeks. If you want to get started in {month}, we should chat soon!

reengagementFlow.ifEngaged: ask qualifying question or share value

buyingSignals: Mentions specific pain points or timeline
Asks how it works or integration questions

conditions: No response after 5+ touchpoints over 60 days

engagementSignals.websiteVisit: Send relevant content based on pages viewed
